page.title: 19ECOLOGY IN SOUTH MOOR
page.content: We have been recording{weather {information}during May and June 1985 for school days only.We rang up the Weather Centre and our figures were not too inaccurate: MAY Maximum 12deg.C. Minimum 7deg.C. Rainfall 59.3m.m. JUNE Maximum 17deg.C. Minimum 10deg.C. Rainfall 45.2m.m. Two groups of children looked at the { {flowers and trees}in different habitats and identified them.One interesting area was once the spoil heap and site of the Charlie Pit and Brickworks.{Reclaimed}about 8 years ago, lots of wild flowers grow there now and trees have been planted One group looked at{pollution.}We have 54 waste bins around our school but we were shocked at the amount of litter we found.Our cleaners must have a hard time cleaning up after us
